description: Assesses use of persuasive techniques including ethos, pathos, and logos

levels.4: Establishes credibility through knowledge, fairness, and appropriate tone
levels.1: No attention to credibility; may undermine trust

feedback_stems.growth: Show readers you know what you're talking about and that you're being fair

levels.4: Appropriate emotional appeals that strengthen the argument
levels.2: Emotional appeals are weak or manipulative

feedback_stems.strength: Your emotional appeal was effective when
feedback_stems.growth: Connect with readers' feelings—help them care about your topic

levels.4: Strong logical reasoning with clear, valid connections between evidence and claims
levels.2: Some logical gaps or weak reasoning

feedback_stems.strength: Your logical reasoning was clear when
feedback_stems.growth: Make sure your evidence clearly supports your claims with logical connections

levels.4: Effectively balances all three appeals throughout
levels.2: Over-relies on one appeal at the expense of others
levels.1: Only one appeal or none used effectively

feedback_stems.strength: You balanced ethos, pathos, and logos well
feedback_stems.growth: Strong arguments use all three appeals—logic, emotion, and credibility
